website_summaries.verdict: A lot of buyers were disoriented by the purpose of the Reebok CrossFit Lite TR. Even though it was presented as a CrossFit shoe, a majority of athletes primarily used it for powerlifting. It offered a rigid, flat sole, excellent grip, and a broader toe box, all of which are essential for this type of training. From this point of view, it was found to be an excellent value for the price. Contrariwise, the same features which made it an efficient powerlifting shoe kept it from becoming all-around training footwear for some people.
pros: The Reebok CrossFit Lite TR impressed numerous athletes with its flat, stiff sole which provided a stable platform for powerlifting
Many buyers found the design of the trainer to be aesthetically pleasing
A lot of reviewers noted that the traction capability of the outsole was top-notch
This shoe made plenty of training enthusiasts feel well-held and supported in the heel area
A considerable number of testers with medium and wide foot dimensions appreciated the extra room in the toe box
Some users mentioned that the trainer was flexible enough to perform CrossFit WODs
A handful of wearers enjoyed doing rope climbs in the shoe
apparently, the soles were sticky enough to grip the rope, and the high-top design kept the ankles safe from abrasion
The shoe was also given praise for the excellent quality of the materials used
cons: Several disgruntled reviewers wrote that the shoe started to fall apart after about a month of use
For some wearers, the CrossFit Lite TR was too hot and restrictive, causing unpleasant odor and discomfort

customer_reviews.title: A happy rebook customer!!!
customer_reviews.text: Omg!! I get so many compliments on my shoes!!! Comfy and fits perfect! I can run on treadmill and get my cardio done and weightlift with no issues!!! Versatile shoe and stylish! Thinking of ordering another pair! I wear these almost everyday to the gym!!! These shoes have lasted and are still in good condition!!! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: hart

customer_reviews.title: If I had more thumbs, I'd give it more than 2 thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Great for lifting but flexible enough to do cardio in. I don't run so not sure about running in these, but I do use the elliptical machine and treadmill with ankle weights, these are comfortable while doing both of those. For lifting these provide a great solid base. Highly recommend these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: carrie thompson

customer_reviews.title: I really like the wide toe box and the u form technology ...
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 pairs of this same shoe but different colors. Fit is true to size. I really like the wide toe box and the u form technology is awesome! I bought these for deadlifts but I ended up buying another pair for work. I love these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and true to size
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are true to size I normally wear a size 5 to 5 1/2 and I ordered these in a 5 and they were perfect. These are great if you have wider feet. The toe box is spacious.
customer_reviews.author: Charissa Skuza

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Awesome fit and perfect for powerlifting to promote proper body mechanics . And they’re cute
customer_reviews.author: Natisha D. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Awkward fit.
customer_reviews.text: Had to return, they weren't the shape of my feet. Cute but were too small (maybe my fault for ordering down) but had strange shape to them on my feet also. Didn't chance the larger size because it didn't seem like they'd fit either.
customer_reviews.author: Cari P

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for powerlifting
customer_reviews.text: This product is highly recommended for powerlifting athletes who are more comfortable using flat sole. I use this for squat, bench, and deadlift. It is perfect for wide toes which spreads during performing squats and deadlift.
customer_reviews.author: powerliftingmommaph

customer_reviews.title: Wide toe area is comfortable. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Fits according to size. Wide toe area is comfortable. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me.
customer_reviews.text: I am an crossfit term athlete. The first wod with my sneakers on i fell in love with them. Perfect for me. Al so I loved the attention i got from the style. Perfect👍
customer_reviews.author: Arena.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too bad Reebok stopped making these...I don't know why, they are a great shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Celeste J.

product_meta.title: Reebok Crossfit Lite Tr Mid 2.0 Gr Training Shoe
feature_bullets: DuraGrip toe cap for protection and abrasion resistance during sports specific activites
